alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:06PM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches above 7000 ft on the Kaibab Plateau and Chuska Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Fredonia, Ganado, Jacob Lake, Kayenta, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected after midnight tonight through Thursday afternoon. Snow forecast from 8 PM Today to 11 PM Thursday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Chinle 2 to 4 inches Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Ganado 3 to 5 inches Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches Kayenta 1 to 3 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau
